TEXT.TITLE: EQUION CORP <EQUI> 2ND QTR JAN 31 NET
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr 19 cts vs 18 cts Oper net 951,902 vs 987,860 Revs 19.0 mln vs 17.1 mln Six mths Oper shr 26 cts vs 35 cts Oper net 1,332,273 vs 2,502,868 Revs 33.6 mln vs 29.2 mln Note: Oper net excludes tax credits of 897,925 dlrs vs 841,511,dlrs for qtr and 1,306,860 dlrs vs 2,132,073 dlrs for six mths. Note: Year-ago results restated to reflect change in accounting principle effective August one, 1985. Reuter
